id: Alterations, Installation of a raised patio and associated balustrade. Installation of privacy trellis to both side boundary fences. Land level changes. (retrospective)
Alterations, erection of roof extension to create half hip roof with 3x dormer extensions in rear roof slope and 4x rooflights in front roof slope
Alterations, Erection of first floor side extension, Removal of chimney, Installation of balustrade to raised patio area.

T6281 - Beech Tree: Lift to 3 metres. Remove young stem at base. Remove climber ( cut back and spray off). T6284 - Birch Tree: Clear building by 1 metre T6309 - Sycamore Tree: One of the two stems need to be felled due to decay, re- pollard other stem by 2 metres. T6324 - Birch Tree: Clear base, remove climber. (TPO 55, 1987)

(T1) Beech - Prune back from Woodland Cottage, Promenande de Verdun by approx 2.5-3 meters (to boundary line) (T2-T3) 2 x Horse Chestnut -Prune back from Woodland Cottage, Promenande de Verdun by approx 2.5-3 meters (to boundary line) (TPO 54, 1986)

Alterations, erection of two-storey side extension, single-storey rear extension, and rear dormer extension, conversion of existing garage, and provision of 2x rooflights in front roofslope and 1x rooflight in side roofslope
Alterations, Erection of single storey side/rear extension.
T1 Cherry Tree: Prune to give 2 metre clearance from building.
T1 Chestnut - Reduce height by up to 4m and laterals by up to 2m below previous reduction points - due to decay in reduction points and main stems. (TPO 23, 1970)
Erection of a two storey dwellinghouse, associated changes in land levels, provision of on-site car parking, cycle and refuse storage.
Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer extension includes installation of 2x rooflights to the front roofslope.
T1 Ash - Fell due to ash dieback (TPO 07, 2010)
se of existing dwelling-house (Use Class C3a) as supported living accommodation (Use Class C3b) for up to 6 resident adults
